post:
We are now providing cheapest Windows VPS servers with both 2003 and 2008 in Web, Standard and Enterprise Edition. All Windows VPS servers come with remote desktop (RDP) enabled. These are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum of 32/16GB RAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Windows VPS servers are available in both USA & UK DC's. You can choose to have MSSQL 2008 and WebsitePanel pre-installed on order form.


OVERVIEW:

  • Windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 (in both 32Bit and 64Bit)
  • MSSQL 2008 with all windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 servers
  • WebSitePanel Panel with all windows 2003, 2008 and windows 2012 servers
  • Remote Desktop (RDP) is Enabled on setup
  • Manual Reboots
  • OS Re-installs
  • Version Changes
  • Web Site Panel Control Panel
  • Both Ipv4 and IPv6 Support
  • Full Adminis trative Ac cess (No Cache)
  • 1-Click Upgrades
  • There are no CONTRACTS
